attributes.action: Make the Horrible Histories 'English kings and queens song' the national anthem
attributes.background: Why should we sing a song about just one monarch when we can represent all of them? Horrible Histories was the best show to ever grace UK television. Make this the national anthem because it represents all of English modern history. The ending will suffice for events such as sporting matches.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as it’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx 

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
